text: Inside the Lines is a 1918 American silent thriller film directed by David Hartford and starring Lewis Stone, Marguerite Clayton and George Field.Wlaschin p.250 It was based on a play by Earl Derr Biggers, later remade as a 1930 sound film of the same title. ==Synopsis== The Germans order their top spy from Egypt to Gibraltar as part of a plan to destroy the British fleet. ==Cast== * Lewis Stone as Captain Cavendish * Marguerite Clayton as Jane Gerson * George Field as Da'mihr * Arthur Allardt as Billy Copper * David Hartford as Dr. Emil Koch * Joseph Singleton as Major Gen * Helen Dunbar as Mrs. Crandall * Willard Wayne as Captain Woodhouse * William Durall as Joseph Almer * Fritz von Hardenberg as Karl Hellinger * Nick Cogley as Henry Sherman * Ida Lewis as Mrs. Henry Sherman ==References== ==Bibliography== * Ken Wlaschin. Silent Mystery and Detective Movies: A Comprehensive Filmography. McFarland, 2009. ==External links== * Category:1918 films Category:1910s thriller films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American thriller films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by David Hartford Category:World Film Company films Category:World War I films Category:American films based on plays Category:Films set in Egypt Category:Films set in Gibraltar
title: Inside the Lines (1918 film)
